p: The mean ± standard error of the mean (SEM) of each group was statistically compared to all other groups using one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) followed by the Student–Newman–Keuls multiple comparison test ( n = 6). The statistical variability between groups was considered significant when p values were ≤0.05. GraphPad Prism software, version 5 (GraphPad Software, Inc., La Jolla, CA, USA), was employed as statistical software.
